availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Marion, Kentucky, merchant. Kentucky native. Married to Mary A. Woods. Merchant in Crittenden County, Kentucky in 1850. Merchant in Marion, Kentucky in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Crittenden, District 2, p. 277B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Crittenden, Marion (West Half), p. 407.
Tenth Manuscript Census of the United States (1880), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Crittenden, Marion, p. 32B.
Find A Grave, "John N. Woods (1816-1896)," Memorial #66227720, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/66227720 (accessed April 20, 2019).
